Package simpletask.main.entities

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpletask.main.entities.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Workspace
    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements Workspace
    A task is a workspace that can contain other workspaces within itself. It will be the main way in which to manage tasks/actions. A task could contian multiple workspaces, i.e. a todo workspace, an in progress workspace, an action etc. This makes a task very flexible and allows the user to create a workspace that suits them
    See Also:
    Workspace, Serialized Form

        public boolean flipCompletionStatus()
        Flips the completion status of the current workspace. Can be used by the user if they wish to manually change the completion status of the current workspace.

      • createWorkspace

        public Workspace createWorkspace​(Workspace workspaceName)
        This creates a new workspace in the current task. A new workspace must first be created, then added to the list of workspaces that the currnet task is tracking. Finally, the that task assigns itself as the parent of the newly created task
        Parameters:
        workspaceName - New workspace to move into current workspace
        Returns:
        The newly created task

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Used to display the task in a readable format to the console. The format is currently, DISPLAYHEADER * {Name of Workspace} * Sub task 1 * Sub task 2 * Sub sub task 1 * Sub sub task 2 * Sub task 3 DISPLAYHEADER
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String to display

      • moveWorkspace

        public boolean moveWorkspace​(Task target)
        Moves the current Task into another Tasks list of tasks. This is done by updating the current Tasks parent, adding it to the list of tasks of it's new parent and removing it from the list of tasks of its old parent.
        Specified by:
        moveWorkspace in interface Workspace
        Parameters:
        target - The current tasks new parent
        Returns:
        True if move was successful

      • deleteWorkspace

        public boolean deleteWorkspace​(Workspace workspace)
        Removes workspace from list of tasks.
        Parameters:
        workspace - Workspace to remove from list of tasks
        Returns:
        True if workspace successfully removed
